Title: Relates to establishing a central business district toll exemption for certain employees of the fire department of the city of New York
Summary: Establishes a central business district toll exemption for employees of the fire department of the city of New York in the title of firefighter, fire marshal, marine engineer, pilot or wiper.
LawCode: Amd ยง1704-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing a central business district toll exemption for certain employees of the fire department of the city of New York
